io.vertx.sqlclient

Class SqlConnectOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.core.net.NetworkOptions
      • io.vertx.core.net.TCPSSLOptions
        • io.vertx.core.net.ClientOptionsBase
          • io.vertx.core.net.NetClientOptions
            • io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlConnectOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DB2ConnectOptions, MySQLConnectOptions, PgConnectOptions

    public class SqlConnectOptions
extends NetClientOptions
    Connect options for configuring SqlConnection or Pool.
